greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows in which row n lists n terms, starting with n, with gaps = n^2-1 between successive terms.
comment: Note that the last term of the n-th row is A100104(n).
link: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
xref: Cf. A100855 (row sums). - _R. J. Mathar_, Jul 20 2009
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Jul 09 2009
